chunk_text: Cocktails can be added for an additional fee. #### Does WHV have to provide Bar Service? We require you to purchase 1 case per 40 guests. You may select from our wine list and we offer a tasting for the couple prior to selection. #### What is the wine minimum purchase? YES! In this situation, there is no wine minimum, but **NO ALCOHOL** may be served at any time during your rental. #### Do you allow DRY weddings?
